titleStmt.title: Romes cruelty & apostacie: declared in a sermon preached on the fifth of November, 1644. Before the Honourable House of Commons. By Anthony Burgess, pastour of Sutton Coldfield; a Member of the Assembly.
titleStmt.author: Burgess, Anthony, d. 1664.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Miller for Tho. Vnderhill at the signe of the Bible in Woodstreet,

notesStmt.note: With a preliminary imprimatur leaf; probably printed as D4.
Running title reads: A sermon preached before the Honourable House of Commons, Novem. 5. 1644.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Bible in Woodstreet
